sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  div(:style="{'background-color':color.bgc, height: '100%'}")

    h1 打卡記錄
    div
      table.myTable
        tr
          th 編號    
          th 日期
          th 時間
          th 時數
        tr(v-for='(record,index) in recordData' :key='index')
          td {{index+1}}
          td.myTd {{record.date}}
          td.myTd {{record.from}}-{{record.to}}
          td.myTd {{record.total}}小時

</template>

<script>
export default {
    data(){
        return{
            recordData: [
            {
                date: "2019-06-30",
                from: "08:30",
                to: "18:30",
                total: "08",
            }
            ],
            color: {
            but: "#333333",
            bgc: "#A78E70"
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
h1,p {
    color: #FFF;
    margin: 20px;
}
</style>
